reviews.review:
Playing killer
Just bought a game in steam and has no progress because of no cross-platform progress saving
Que for a match
BBQ & Chilli lvl 2, survivor pudding
Game goes well for you
3/4 survs dead, Claudette remains
See her with BBQ
Go for her
Game crashes
Enters game
Pudding pudded these points behind your fat cheeks and disappeared
Add-ons disappeared(I know they do that in normal game but this one isn't normal one)
No BPs
1 hour cooldown
Thanks, BHVR.

P.S. I solved that issue, if you have the same, then just use the MSI Afterburner and drop Core Clock and Memory Clock to the minimum (or at least to the acceptable value).
Definitely recommend it to others that are looking for a thrilling chase, escape, or hunt!

Update:
Dont get it, the SBMM of the game is extremely skewed and unforgiving to new players, you can and will encounter someone who may be ash level 4 the lowest level or Iridescent 1 the highest. I have played games where I meet noobs and pros, not to mention you will encounter players who can and will DDoS the server, and cheat... The level of toxicity is absolutely shitty in this game, its no COD lobby or LoL match, but players will find ways to troll you as killers or survivors.... I dont recommend for anyone
Good game, no other explanation needed. Buy it or I will find you. Legion is gonna make me shit myself!

First off, I want to say that I loved this game. It's how I made so many of my close friends. I owe it a lot for bringing so many kind people into my life. That being said, I highly recommend against playing this game in it's current state. I have over 2,500 hours in this game. I play perkless survivor and also play killer. With the recent patch I want to say that I agree with a few things and disagree with others. First off, I want to say that I've never used dead hard or noed. It felt like a cheap safety blanket if i messed up and still wanted an easy win. I think they sould have reworked Noed in the same manner as dead hard. The change they made to dead hard was good. It was frustrating playing killer, making all the right plays, and still losing because a survivor could use a perk to just dodge a hit that would have landed otherwise. Killers receiving bloodlust faster seems like a huge mistake. The original reason bloodlust was even a thing was so killers with weaker powers could still have a chance of closing chases. Killers like Freddy, Wraith, and Trapper to name a few. The fact that you can't outplay the other side so the game just makes you faster until you're moving 30% faster than them is insane!I don't think the DS nerf was a smart one. I understand the endgame deactivation clause, but the stun duration time was balanced. If you were getting tunneled, and you hit the DS check, then you had a chance to get some distance before the killer was back on you. That is no longer the case. I like the nerf to slowdown perks in genreal with a few exceptions, but who doesn't have preferances? I think killers running 4 slowdowns said more about MMR than the players themselves. If you need 4 slowdowns just to prolong the game to have a chance to catch the survivors then should you really be in that skill bracket? In closing, This game used to be fun, but the latest update has destroyed the experiance of a formerly fun game. Until they undo some of the recent changes then I highly recommend against this game.

this game is a fun game to play with friends or even solo queue as survivor or killer! the game even has a fun skill ceiling with both types of playstyles in my opinion.

BUT the game does not come without its negatives. id say in order to have the most fun in the game, is to accept that the game is very unbalanced (like League of Legends for example) AND to not let the toxicity of other people get to you. this game has an INCREDIBLY toxic community with many possible play-styles that heavily appeal to people who abuse them. the t-bagging may get to you, the same perks may get to you, abusive killers may get to you. it's just a video game. the salt will come, but letting it into your bloodstream is when you should take a break. behaviour as a company could also use some work, but we really can't do much about that.

the game is meant to be played for fun as a competitive killer hunt survivor 1v4 game. and please don't dog on other people playing the game, as long as no insults or slurs are being thrown around, banter is completely fine. and if none of what i said persuades you to at least try the game, check out other games of the same style like the upcoming VHS and Propnight games!!
